title: Competitive - cant invite player
body: Hello, i cant invite 2 specific players to my team in competitive, but if i try to invite other players its possible. Both players that i cant invite got banned recently. Is it because of the ban?

replies.body:
It's probably not letting you invite those players if their Honor Rank is below rank 2. 


> 3.    As a team captain, invite your friends, select a team icon and name,  and choose how many Tickets you want to enter (the more Tickets, the more Capsules youâ€™ll get)
> note: remember, everyone on the team needs to be: level 30+, ranked in at least one Summoner's Rift queue, and Honor level 2+

Check out the Clash Discord for all the info, you can also ask the devs any questions you might have ^_^!

https://discord.gg/league-clash-beta

As of right now, the new mode has a limit that only players of Honor 2 or higher are allowed to play. This is likely (but not confirmed or officially) to be to ensure there is a calm and honorable environment so that actual bugs can be squashed before it's rolled out to other regions. I suspect (but cannot guarantee or confirm) that they will revise the requirement or remove it altogether before it's rolled out everywhere.

Got a 10 game chat restriction for flame in one game. Had no rewards for a month and a half. Now I'm rank 1 and can't go in the tournament. 
Yey...
Had a bad game and Riot is still punishing me for it...
